short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for your favorite forts in Wikipedia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for your favorite forts in Wikipedia - just press "f+tab" and the name of the fort, press enter and you’ll get the best information from Wikipedia.

Please note:
This extension changes your Default Search in Chrome browser to Yahoo.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to install the SearchFort extension and setting Chrome™ default search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms & Conditions - https://search-fort.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://search-fort.com/privacy.html
About Us - https://search-fort.com/about-us.html

You may remove or disable this extension at any time.
